structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
C RESTRUCTURE OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN COUNTY CONTAINING CITY OF FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: Police officer or labor organization not to participate in strike.
law.text: No police officer of a consolidated local government shall engage in, and no police officer labor organization shall sponsor or condone, any strike.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 10, effective July 13, 2004.
